invite.Title: Invite Server
invite.Body:
Use this link below to add PokeTrainer to another discord server!

[Invite PokeTrainer](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1151657435073875988&permissions=395674216512&scope=bot)

register.Title: Server Registered
Register Error
register.Body: There was an error while registering your server with PokeTrainer. Please try again or contact us.

server.Title: Server Details
Server Details
server.Body: Server is not registered. Use **/register** command. Use **/help register** for more information.

swapchannel.Title: Channel Changed
swapchannel.Body: Any events or public messages from PokeTrainer will now show up in this channel.

swapchannel.Title: Channel Not Changed
swapchannel.Body: This is already your registered channel. If you wish to change where events and notifications are sent, run this command in the new channel.

unregister.Title: Server Unregistered
unregister.Body:
Events and announcements will now be stop being sent to your server. To begin again, use the **/register** command.

Users may still interact with PokeTrainer while it is present in the server.
